Syrup!
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 3 Archive (PS2): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): Syrup!
By torey_luvullo on Wednesday, May 1, 2002 - 06:17 pm:

in the year 1209, i found myself seeing a tiny storyline bit that i had never seen before. i had taken my dummy monster, a mocchi, to the ran ran event in goat, and when i fed him afterwards, a new animation and dialog popped up. as i watched, a new trainer who i had never seen before [a young woman/teen girl named muto] tried to claim little chi as her own. fleria argued with her, and they went at it a little bit until syrup himself came out from behind a rock. he was identical with chi, except he was one stage larger. they battled, and poor little chi had his little mocchi butt handed to him. then muto and syrup left, but as they did, they left us some honey candy as an "apology".

nearly a year later, i see no other effects on my game or on my monster as a result of this meeting.

By terance on Wednesday, May 1, 2002 - 06:31 pm:

By torey_luvullo on Wednesday, May 1, 2002 - 06:53 pm:

heh. lisa will find out about this when she reads the board.

By torey_luvullo on Thursday, May 2, 2002 - 05:05 am:

since i have "unlocked" her, muto has now taken her place in the rotation of featured rivals in the official tourneys [the one who appears before and after the tourney, and whose monster you fight last.]

By thecampster on Thursday, May 2, 2002 - 06:12 am:

By ShadowFusion on Thursday, May 2, 2002 - 10:34 am:

By ShadowFusion on Thursday, May 2, 2002 - 10:36 am:

This makes me wonder if there are any other psudo-storylines that may come about if you were to raise a different monster.

By torey_luvullo on Thursday, May 2, 2002 - 10:51 am:

me too, sf. she is maybe the cutest/most attractive of the female assistants - she has well-coiffed orangish hair with a hint of cleavage [thats as far down as you see on the screen] and a pinkish ribbon/bow around her head/hair. when i defeated her in the official battle [and it wasnt her mocchi, syrup, who i beat - it was some other monster] she got all evil and frazzled looking and screamed "HOW COULD I LOSE!!!" then composed herself back to being beautiful by the next screen.

theoretically, there could be other "hidden rivals" just waiting for exactly the right event to trigger their appearance...

By Lisa Shock on Thursday, May 2, 2002 - 12:12 pm:

By John Hawley on Saturday, November 23, 2002 - 06:07 pm:

As new information to this post, it seems to require a pure Mocchi (Mocchi/Morx) to trigger this event. I got it almost immediately with a Mocchi, but the Koloron and Cosmocchi ran thru their whole lifes without triggering the storyline.

Unfortunately, I don't have a way to check for what you might get if you win the battle. Copied over the one save at exactly the wrong time.
